title: Ticket #2520: BatLab use-case for Condor and UCS
description:
We want any support for UCS that we add to Condor to be guided by the needs and wants of an actual user of Condor and UCS. The initial user is the BatLab. We need to talk with them about what interaction between Condor and UCS would benefit them.

Milestones

  • Meet with BatLab people to discuss what they would like with Condor and UCS.
creator: jfrey
